original_text: to the place where he had made an altar at the first. And there Abram called upon the name of the Lord.
korean_text: 그가 처음으로 제단을 쌓은 곳이라 그가 거기서 여호와의 이름을 불렀더라

sentences.original_text: to the place where he had made an altar at the first
And there Abram called upon the name of the Lord.
